alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 07 at 2:10PM CDT until June 09 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River near Emporia affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River near Emporia. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, South bank of the Cottonwood River 1 mile south of Emporia floods. At 23.0 feet, North bank of the Cottonwood River begins to flood. Lowland flooding occurs along the Cottonwood River from Plymouth to Neosho Rapids. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 23.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 6.8 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/top/.
